column4: This is pure cruelty. It’s clear POTUS’ brush with #COVID has taught him nothing. Millions are struggling, and with COVID only speeding up and Flu season right around the corner, the Admin refusing to deal means there will be nothing to help Americans through. https://t.co/wVzN9ySdKN

Republicans are blocking crucial bills in the Senate that would raise minimum wage and provide further relief to businesses and individuals sidelined by #COVID. Democrats are fighting #ForThePeople.

In #NYC, 94% of public schools are within a 1,000 ft (about 2 city blocks) of a tobacco retailer. This easy access, coupled with kid-friendly flavors, has fueled the youth e-cigarette epidemic. I’ve introduced the Smoke-Free Schools Act, which bans vaping in schools.

Additionally, the HEROES Act includes several provisions I advocated for to help NY:
✅2.5% bump in Medicaid DSH payments
✅My “Safeguarding Therapeutics Act,” which allows the FDA to destroy fake medical devices, including fake COVID19 tests
✅$5B for NY public education system

✅$75 billion for testing and contact tracing
✅15% increase to SNAP #HandsOffSNAP
✅Additional $1,200 check for Americans, and up to $6,000 for a family
✅$25 billion for the Post Office
✅$186.5 million in election assistance

I’m voting ✅ on the Heroes Act because: 
✅State Assistance: $34 billion
✅Local Assistance: $32 billion
✅Eliminates SALT cap deduction
✅$175 billion in housing aid, including $100 billion for emergency rental assistance I called for
✅$100 billion for hospitals
